bibl.title: Una festa auspicata? (Sapph. fr. 17 V. e P. GC. inv. 105 fr. 2 col. II rr. 9-28).
bibl.note: Sapph. fr. 17 V. in the light of the new P. GC. inv. 105 [P. Coll. privées: P. Green Inv. 105 (= M.-P.3 1445.01; LDAB 341738)]: critical edition and exegetical notes, with some proposals of integration and an overall interpretation. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Camillo Neri, Una festa auspicata? (Sapph. fr. 17 V. e P. GC. inv. 105 fr. 2 col. II rr. 9-28).

Sapph. fr. 17 V. in the light of the new P. GC. inv. 105 [P. Coll. privées: P. Green Inv. 105 (= M.-P.3 1445.01; LDAB 341738)]: critical edition and exegetical notes, with some proposals of integration and an overall interpretation. - Avec résumé en anglais.
